name: Zombie Skateboarder High School - Life On The Run Surviving The Fire!
name_original: Zombie Skateboarder High School - Life On The Run Surviving The Fire!
description:
What do you need for school? BRAINS!!! MMMM…. BRAINS!!

Collect BRAINS and get to school fast! Outrun the flames - you can see how close they are at the bottom of the screen! :-)

But don't let the flames from the burning buildings catch up with you or game over... just skate, skate, skate!!

Unlock new zombie characters! Complete levels collecting as many brains (mmmm... brains....) as you can!

In MULTIPLAYER MODE: Play against other REAL zombies (well, okay, just people) as they try to out-skate you! You'll see them as big zombies that flicker away from you at the start... catch them!!

GAME FEATURES:

‣ FUN APP WHICH IS GREAT FOR ALL AGES!
‣ Cool graphics!
‣ Funny and evil Zombies!
‣ SPOOKY MUSIC!
‣ 100% PURE SKATEBOARDING FUN FUN FUN!!!!

Note: This app contains the ability to purchase optional content using real money. If you don't want this feature, disable payment features in your device in-app purchases settings.

If you love this game, please support it by leaving a review in the app store. Thanks for your help we really appreciate it!
